TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PaginateHandler(object o, PaginateArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PaginateHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PaginateHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PaginateHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PaginateHandler is removed from the event.
